metadata.comments: This playbook allows users to validate any PLC programming command which is performed to prevent a Triton attack.
metadata.author: Amit Sheps and Lior Tamir

body.CloseReasonText: Sent from Engineering workstation (IP was found in authorized list)

inputs.body:
CommonSecurityLog
| where SourceIp contains @{first(body('Alert_-_Get_IPs')?['IPs'])}  | where  Message contains "RDP" or Message contains "SSH" or Message contains "telnet" or Message contains "Malware"

body.Comment: Machine was found as part of Triton attack

body.content:
A critical incident was created. And a device was automatically blocked.

Machine IP: @{first(body('Run_query_and_list_results_-_Remote_Access_connections')?['value'])?['SourceIp']}
Sentinel Alert id: @{items('For_each_2')?['SystemAlertId']}

body.Value: PLC Proggraming occured from a non-engineering workstation, that was remotly accessed by an unauthorized IT PC

body.content:
Remote access for engineering station from unauthorized PC:
@{first(body('Run_query_and_list_results_-_Remote_Access_connections')?['value'])?['SourceIp']}

Sentinel Alert id: @{items('For_each_2')?['SystemAlertId']}

Gather_all_PC_alerts_in_MDATP.description: Get all alerts associated with the IP

Was_the_remote_access_done_by_an_Authori.description: If the IP address found has length (an IP was found in the Authorized PCs list)

body.Body:
The following events were found on the suspicious machine:
@{body('Get_all_logs_from_the_attacker_machine_2')?['value']}
body.Subject: Unauthorized PLC programming occured

body.Body:
The following events were found on the suspicious machine:
@{body('Get_all_logs_from_the_attacker_machine')?['value']}
body.Subject: Unauthorized PLC programming occured not during working hours

Condition_-_Was_the_programming_happened.description: First condition: take only the hour 2 digits from incident creation time. Second condition: dayOfWeek() returns number between 0-6, Saturday ==6, Sunday ==0

inputs.body:
SecurityAlert
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity" and AlertName== "Unauthorized PLC Programming"
